title: VillageSQL Extension Manifest
description: Metadata file required in every .veb extension bundle.

name.description: Extension identifier. Must start with a lowercase letter and end with a letter or digit. May contain lowercase letters, digits, underscores, and hyphens. Convention: use underscores (e.g. vsql_ai), not hyphens. Must match the VEB filename (without .veb) and the first argument to make_extension().

license.description: License identifier. GPL-2.0 recommended for VillageSQL extensions.

$schema.description: Optional JSON Schema reference for IDE validation and autocomplete.
